items.name: Ring Target
items.description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.

items.name: Rock Gem
items.description: Increases the power of a Rock-type move only once.

items.name: Rock Incense
items.description: Increases the power of Rock-type moves. Breeding Sudowoodo produces Bonsly when held.

items.name: Rock Memory
items.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Rock type.

items.name: Rocky Helmet
items.description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

items.name: Roller Skates
items.description: Attaches roller skates to the bottom of your shoes, allowing you to glide quickly around and perform tricks.

items.name: Root Fossil
items.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a plant root.

items.name: Rose Incense
items.description: Increases the power of Grass-type moves. Breeding Roselia or Roserade produces Budew when held.

items.name: Roseli Berry
items.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fairy-type attack.

items.name: Roto Bargain
items.description: Reduces the prices of products at Poké Marts by half.

items.name: Roto Boost
items.description: Raises all stats of your battling Pokémon.

items.name: Roto Catch
items.description: Increases the chance to catch Pokémon a lot.

items.name: Roto Encounter
items.description: Increases the chance of encountering high-level wild Pokémon a lot for a certain period of time.

items.name: Roto Friendship
items.description: Helps Pokémon in your party grow friendly faster.

items.name: Roto Hatch
items.description: Helps Eggs hatch faster.

items.name: Roto HP Restore
items.description: Fully restores the HP of your battling Pokémon.

items.name: Roto PP Restore
items.description: Fully restores the PP of your battling Pokémon.

items.name: Roto Prize Money
items.description: Triples the prize money you receive after battle.

items.name: Roto Stealth
items.description: Prevents you from encountering wild Pokémon for a certain period of time.

items.name: Rowap Berry
items.description: If held by a Pokémon and a special attack lands, the attacker also takes damage.

items.name: Rule Book
items.description: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use.

items.name: Sablenite
items.description: Enables Sableye to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Sachet
items.description: Evolves Spritzee when traded holding the item.

items.name: Sacred Ash
items.description: It revives all fainted Pokémon. In doing so, it also fully restores their HP.

items.name: Safari Ball
items.description: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a camouflage pattern.

items.name: Safety Goggles
items.description: Prevents damage from weather and powder.

items.name: Salac Berry
items.description: Raises Speed when HP is low.

items.name: Salamencite
items.description: Enables Salamence to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Scanner
items.description: A device used to search for life-forms in water. It looks too difficult to use.

items.name: Sceptilite
items.description: Enables Sceptile to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Scizorite
items.description: Enables Scizor to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Scope Lens
items.description: Increases critical-hit ratio.

items.name: Sea Incense
items.description: Increases the power of Water-type moves. Breeding Marill or Azumarill produces Azurill when held.

items.name: Seal Bag
items.description: A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for decorating Poké Balls.

items.name: Seal Case
items.description: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the capsule cases of Poké Balls.

items.name: Secret Key
items.description: A high-tech key that has to be used at a specific location. It emits a special electric signal to open a door.

items.name: Secret Potion
items.description: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

items.name: Shalour Sable
items.description: Heals all major status conditions.

items.name: Sharp Beak
items.description: Increases the power of Flying-type moves.

items.name: Sharpedonite
items.description: Enables Sharpedo to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Shed Shell
items.description: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.

items.name: Shell Bell
items.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.

items.name: Shiny Charm
items.description: A shiny charm said to increase the chance of finding a Shiny Pokémon in the wild.

items.name: Shiny Stone
items.description: Evolves certain species of Pokémon.

items.name: Shoal Salt
items.description: Pure salt that can be discovered deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Shoal Shell
items.description: A pretty seashell that can be found deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Shock Drive
items.description: Changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move when held by Genesect.

items.name: Shuca Berry
items.description: Weakens a supereffective Ground-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

items.name: Silk Scarf
items.description: Increases the power of Normal-type moves.

items.name: Silver Powder
items.description: Increases the power of Bug-type moves.

items.name: Silver Wing
items.description: A strange, silvery feather that sparkles.

items.name: Sitrus Berry
items.description: If held by a Pokémon, it heals the user's HP a little.

items.name: Skull Fossil
items.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.

items.name: Sky Plate
items.description: Increases power of Flying-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Flying.

items.name: Slowbronite
items.description: Enables Slowbro to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Slowpoke Tail
items.description: A very tasty tail of something. It sells for a high price.

items.name: Smoke Ball
items.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon without fail.

items.name: Smooth Rock
items.description: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.

items.name: Snowball
items.description: Raises Attack if hit by an Ice-type move.

items.name: Soda Pop
items.description: Restores 50 HP.

items.name: Soft Sand
items.description: Increases the power of Ground-type moves.

items.name: Soot Sack
items.description: A sack used to collect volcanic ash automatically during walks over deep ash.

items.name: Soothe Bell
items.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bell with a comforting chime that calms the holder and makes it friendly.

items.name: Soul Dew
items.description: Increases the power of Psychic- and Dragon-type moves when held by Latios or Latias. Increases Sp.Atk/Sp.Def prior to Gen 7.

items.name: Sparkling Stone
items.description: A stone entrusted by a Pokémon that has been venerated as a guardian deity in the Alola region. There is said to be some secret in how it sparkles.

items.name: Spell Tag
items.description: Increases the power of Ghost-type moves.

items.name: Spelon Berry
items.description: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Splash Plate
items.description: Increases power of Water-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Water.

items.name: Spooky Plate
items.description: Increases power of Ghost-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Ghost.

items.name: Sport Ball
items.description: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

items.name: Sprayduck
items.description: A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.

items.name: Sprinklotad
items.description: A watering can shaped like a Lotad. It helps promote the healthy growth of any Berries planted in good, soft soil.

items.name: Squirt Bottle
items.description: A bottle used for watering plants in the Berry Pots.

items.name: Stable Mulch
items.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Star Piece
items.description: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.name: Stardust
items.description: Lovely, red-colored sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

items.name: Starf Berry
items.description: Sharply raises a random stat when HP is low.

items.name: Steel Gem
items.description: Increases the power of a Steel-type move only once.

items.name: Steel Memory
items.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Steel type.

items.name: Steelixite
items.description: Enables Steelix to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Sticky Barb
items.description: A held item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to foes and allies that touch the holder.

items.name: Stone Plate
items.description: Increases power of Rock-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Rock.

items.name: Storage Key
items.description: The key to Team Galactic's sinister warehouse located at the edge of Veilstone City.

items.name: Strange Souvenir
items.description: An ornament depicting a Pokémon that is venerated as a protector in some region far from Kalos.

items.name: Suite Key
items.description: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.

items.name: Sun Flute
items.description: It is said that the tones it produces were offered up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary Pokémon of the sun.

items.name: Sun Stone
items.description: Evolves certain species of Pokémon.

items.name: Super Potion
items.description: Restores 60 HP.

items.name: Super Repel
items.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps after its use.

items.name: Super Rod
items.description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.name: Surge Badge
items.description: Novelty badge from the Kantonian Gym.

items.name: Surprise Mulch
items.description: Mulch to be used in a Berry field. It causes strange, sudden mutations based on the combination of Berries.

items.name: Swampertite
items.description: Enables Swampert to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Sweet Heart
items.description: Very sweet chocolate. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by only 20 points.

items.name: Tamato Berry
items.description: Increases Friendship but lowers Speed EVs.

items.name: Tanga Berry
items.description: Weakens a supereffective Bug-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

items.name: Terrain Extender
items.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder's move or Ability.

items.name: Thick Club
items.description: Increases Attack when held by Cubone or Marowak.

items.name: Thunder Stone
items.description: Evolves certain species of Pokémon.

items.name: Tidal Bell
items.description: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.

items.name: Timer Ball
items.description: A somewhat different BALL that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle.

items.name: Tiny Mushroom
items.description: A small and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.

items.name: TMV Pass
items.description: A commuter pass that allows the holder to ride the TMV between Lumiose City and Kiloude City at any time.

items.name: Town Map
items.description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.

items.name: Toxic Orb
items.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.

items.name: Toxic Plate
items.description: Increases power of Poison-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Poison.

items.name: Twisted Spoon
items.description: Increases the power of Psychic-type moves.

items.name: Tyranitarite
items.description: Enables Tyranitar to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.

items.name: Unown Report
items.description: A report of all the discovered kinds of UNOWN.

items.name: Venusaurite
items.description: Enables Venusaur to Mega Evolve during battle.

items.name: Wacan Berry
items.description: Weakens a supereffective Electric-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

items.name: Wailmer Pail
items.description: A nifty watering pail. Use it to promote strong growth in BERRIES planted in soft soil.

items.name: Water Gem
items.description: Increases the power of a Water-type move only once.

items.name: Water Memory
items.description: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Water type.

items.name: Water Stone
items.description: Evolves certain species of Pokémon.

items.name: Watmel Berry
items.description: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Wave Incense
items.description: Increases the power of Water-type moves. Breeding Mantine produces Mantyke when held.

items.name: Weakness Policy
items.description: Sharply raises Attack and Special Attack if hit by a super-effective move.

items.name: Wepear Berry
items.description: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Whipped Dream
items.description: Evolves Swirlix when traded holding the item.

items.name: White Apricorn
items.description: A white Apricorn. It doesn't smell like anything.

items.name: White Flute
items.description: A toy flute made from white glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: White Herb
items.description: An item to be held by a POKéMON. It restores any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

items.name: Wide Lens
items.description: Increases the accuracy of moves.

items.name: Wiki Berry
items.description: Restores HP if it's low, but may cause confusion.

items.name: Wise Glasses
items.description: Increases the power of Special-category moves.

items.name: Works Key
items.description: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

items.description: Sharply raises Accuracy of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Drastically raises Accuracy of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Raises Accuracy of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Drastically raises Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Immensely raises Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

items.name: X Attack
items.description: Raises Attack of a Pokémon in battle.

items.name: X Defense 2
items.description: Sharply raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

items.name: X Defense 3
items.description: Drastically raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Immensely raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Raises Defense of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Drastically raises Speed of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Immensely raises Speed of a Pokémon in battle.

items.description: Raises Speed of a Pokémon in battle.

items.name: Xtransceiver
items.description: A high-tech transceiver with a camera function. It allows up to four-way calls.

items.name: Yache Berry
items.description: Weakens a supereffective Ice-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

items.name: Yellow Apricorn
items.description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.

items.name: Yellow Flute
items.description: A toy flute made from yellow glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

items.name: Yellow Nectar
items.description: A flower nectar obtained at Melemele Meadow. It changes the form of certain species of Pokémon.

items.name: Yellow Petal
items.description: Petal received from Sophocles during Mina's trial.

items.name: Yellow Scarf
items.description: Raises holder's Tough aspect in a Contest.

items.name: Yellow Shard
items.description: A small yellow shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

items.name: Z-Ring
items.description: A mysterious ring that enables Pokémon to use Z-Power. It requires both the willpower and the physical power of the Trainer wearing it.

items.name: Zap Plate
items.description: Increases power of Electric-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Electric.

items.name: Zinc
items.description: Increases Special Defense EVs by 10.

items.name: Zoom Lens
items.description: Raises a move's accuracy if the holder moves after its target.

items.name: Zygarde Cube
items.description: An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells. You can also use it to teach Zygarde moves.
